text: Arau yetiya sihamtara ocarata pathanirdesa ahila, tetiya manuhaka imana anara paraa arau sihamtara pratipalakara ocarata ksama praarthana karaara paraa kerala e'itorae'i birata raakhe ye, sihamtara ocarato purbarartisalara darae anusrta raiti ahaka na'iba sihamtara ocarata pratyaksabharae sasti ahaka
